Naruto, in his [[Six Paths Sage Mode]] and Kawaki utilising his [[Microscopic Scientific Ninja Tools|Scientific Ninja Tool]] alterations, attack the opponent and finish them by attacking from both sides with a Rasengan and a chakra blast from Kawaki's Kāma.
